content.title: Portfolio Tools
content.details:
Tools to analyse the diversification of financial portfolios. 
 
The portfolio is retreived from the broker via its specific API.
All equities are available for visualization, with quantity, amount and other metrics, 
and graphs show their geographic and sector distribution, according to stored preferences. 
 
<u>FrontEnd:</u> Angular 13, rxjs, PrimeNG 
<u>BackEnd:</u> Node Express 
<u>Database:</u> MongoDB

content.title: Audio App
content.details:
Audio player to play locally stored .mp3 and .wav files. 
 
Mainly developped for mobile use with local songs. 
 
The app provides several themes and a custom audio player with all usual functions (replay, next, volume...). 
The app is also fully reactive and entirely developped with ngRx. 
 
The mobile version is deployed with Apache Cordova. 
 
<u>FrontEnd:</u> Angular 13, ngRx 
<u>BackEnd:</u> none 
<u>Database:</u> none

content.title: Maze Generator
content.details:
Simple maze generator using commons generation algorithms such as Prim and Depth First Search. 
 
A pathfinding animation is provided using Breadth First Search. 
Everything is in vanilla JS and HTML.

content.title: Pathfinding
content.details:
Simple JS and jQuery program to illustrate some pathfindings algorithms such as Dijikstra, BFS and A star. 
 
A simple grid offers the user the possibility to draw different terrains accounting for different weights, and witness the algorithm finding his way to the exit.
